smg.text: Very dry. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Very dry. Mainly fine. Force 2 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Dry. Mainly fine. Force 2 to 3 north to northeasterly winds.
Dry. Mainly fine. Force 3 north to northeasterly winds, becoming force 4 to 5 with gusts.
Temperature falling slightly. Fine. Force 4 to 5 northerly winds, occasionally force 6 with gusts.
Very dry. Fine. Force 3 to 4 northerly winds.
Very dry. Fine. Force 3 to 4 northerly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
